price_type = lambda x: float(x[1:-1])
print(price_type)

source.1a099f8c:
# Solution 1

chipo['revenue'] = chipo['quantity'] * chipo['item_price']
order_grouped = chipo.groupby(by=['order_id']).sum()
order_grouped.mean()['revenue']
